title: SpiderCNN: Deep Learning on Point Sets with Parameterized Convolutional Filters

tldr.text: This work proposes a novel convolutional architecture, termed SpiderCNN, to efficiently extract geometric features from point clouds, which inherits the multi-scale hierarchical architecture from the classical CNNs, which allows it to extract semantic deep features.
